cardsInfo.title: Plant Word Guru
cardsInfo.text: A plant’s common name is given together with the plant’s image. Players guess the corresponding scientific name in a certain time frame.

cardsInfo.title: Plant Word Guru II
cardsInfo.text: A plant’s common name is given together with the plant’s image. Players guess the corresponding correct scientific name in a certain time frame from a set of 4 given scientific names.

cardsInfo.title: 1word4pics / 1wort4bilder
cardsInfo.text: This game prototype shows the player a common plant name and the correct image has to be selected in a given time frame.

cardsInfo.title: Game Playground / Spielplatz
cardsInfo.text: This prototype offers players a selection of different games.

cardsInfo.title: Drop-the-word / Wort-drop
cardsInfo.text: This game asks players to select the given common names of plants and match them with their corresponding scientific name by drag-and-drop function.

cardsInfo.title: Search4words / Wörtersuche
cardsInfo.text: In search4words players need to find the set of given words in the crosswords field.

cardsInfo.title: Concept Lights / Konzeptlichter
cardsInfo.text: Concept Lights / Konzeptlichter visually explores concepts occurring in and across different questions within individual questionnaires. In addition, information concept grouping within questionnaires as well as collocation information is displayed.
